tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces
Interface IAdInstance

public interface IAdInstance

Internal context of an ad instance. Note: Some methods and references to ICreativeRendition and ICreativeRenditionAsset are *not* available for player right now.

Method Summary

Method Detail

getAdId

int getAdId()
Get the ad id.

Returns:
an int value represent ad id

getRendererController

IRendererController getRendererController()
Get IRendererController of the ad. Only for player use.

Returns:
IRendererController of the ad

getParameter

java.lang.Object getParameter(java.lang.String name)
Retrieve the parameters from the ad instance. The parameter value will be retrieved from levels in the following order: override, creative rendition, creative, slot, profile, global. Only for player use.

Parameters:
name - parameter name
Returns:
the value of the parameter

getSlot

ISlot getSlot()
Get the ad slot which contain this ad. Only for renderer use.

Returns:
an object of ISlot

getDuration

double getDuration()
Get the duration of the ad. It returns the most accurate value available to AdManager, which may come from the renderer or the ad response XML. The value reported by the renderer is considered more accurate than the value from ad response, aka. the creative duration value booked in MRM UI.

Returns:
the duration of the ad, in seconds.

getPlayheadTime

double getPlayheadTime()
Get the playhead time of the ad.

Returns:
the playhead time of the ad, in seconds.

getActiveCreativeRendition

ICreativeRendition getActiveCreativeRendition()
Get active rendition of the ad instance. Only for renderer use.

Returns:
an object of ICreativeRendition

getAllCreativeRenditions

java.util.ArrayList<ICreativeRendition> getAllCreativeRenditions()
Get all renditions of this ad instance. Only for renderer use.

Returns:
an ArrayList of type ICreativeRendition

getRenderableCreativeRenditions

java.util.ArrayList<ICreativeRendition> getRenderableCreativeRenditions()
Get renderable renditions of this ad instance. Only for renderer use.

Returns:
an ArrayList of renderable ICreativeRendition

setActiveCreativeRendition

void setActiveCreativeRendition(ICreativeRendition rendition)
Set the active rendition of this ad, this rendition will finally be showed. Only for renderer use.

Parameters:
rendition - the active rendition will be set

createCreativeRenditionForTranslation

ICreativeRendition createCreativeRenditionForTranslation()
Add a creative rendition to the ad instance. Only for renderer use.

Returns:
the ICreativeRendition object added to the ad instance

addEventCallbackURLs

void addEventCallbackURLs(java.lang.String eventName,
                          java.lang.String eventType,
                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> urls)
Append additional tracking URLs to certain event specified by eventName and eventType. Only for renderer use.

Parameters:
eventName - name of the event
eventType - type of the event
urls - ArrayList of URLs to be added

Available combination of input:
(EVENT_AD_IMPRESSION, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION) - impression, aka ad display start
(EVENT_AD_CLICK, EVENT_TYPE_CLICK_TRACKING) - click tracking
("a_custom_string", EVENT_TYPE_CLICK_TRACKING) - custom click tracking
(EVENT_AD_FIRST_QUARTILE, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION) - 1st quartile
(EVENTCALLBACK_MIDPOINT, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION) - middle point
(EVENTCALLBACK_THIRDQUARTILE, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION) - 3rd quartile
(EVENTCALLBACK_COMPLETE, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION) - complete
(EVENT_AD_PAUSE, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, pause
(EVENT_AD_RESUME, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, resume
(EVENT_AD_REWIND, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, rewind
(EVENT_AD_MUTE, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, mute
(EVENT_AD_UNMUTE, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, unmute
(EVENT_AD_COLLAPSE, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, collapse
(EVENT_AD_EXPAND, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, expand
(EVENT_AD_MINIMIZE, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, minimize
(EVENT_AD_CLOSE, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, close
(EVENT_AD_ACCEPT_INVITATION, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, accept invitation

setClickThroughURL

void setClickThroughURL(java.lang.String url,
                        java.lang.String clickName)
Set click through URL (replaces the CR value). Only for renderer use.

Parameters:
url - URL in String
clickName - name of the click in String, if clickName is null or empty, will set click through url to default click callback

getEventCallbackURLs

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getEventCallbackURLs(java.lang.String eventName,
                                                           java.lang.String eventType)
Get the event callback URLs in an ArrayList. Only for renderer use.

Parameters:
eventName - name of the event
eventType - type of the event
Returns:
ArrayList of event callback URLs

Available combination of input:
(EVENT_AD_IMPRESSION, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION) - impression, aka ad display start
(EVENT_AD_CLICK, EVENT_TYPE_CLICK) - click through
(EVENT_AD_CLICK, EVENT_TYPE_CLICK_TRACKING) - click tracking
("a_custom_string", EVENT_TYPE_CLICK) - custom click
("a_custom_string", EVENT_TYPE_CLICK_TRACKING) - custom click tracking
(EVENT_AD_FIRST_QUARTILE, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION) - 1st quartile
(EVENTCALLBACK_MIDPOINT, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION) - middle point
(EVENTCALLBACK_THIRDQUARTILE, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION) - 3rd quartile
(EVENTCALLBACK_COMPLETE, EVENT_TYPE_IMPRESSION) - complete
(EVENT_AD_PAUSE, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, pause
(EVENT_AD_RESUME, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, resume
(EVENT_AD_REWIND, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, rewind
(EVENT_AD_MUTE, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, mute
(EVENT_AD_UNMUTE, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, unmute
(EVENT_AD_COLLAPSE, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, collapse
(EVENT_AD_EXPAND, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, expand
(EVENT_AD_MINIMIZE, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, minimize
(EVENT_AD_CLOSE, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, close
(EVENT_AD_ACCEPT_INVITATION, EVENT_TYPE_STANDARD) - IAB metric, accept invitation

getCompanionAdInstances

java.util.ArrayList<IAdInstance> getCompanionAdInstances()
Get the playable companion ad instances.

Returns:
an ArrayList of IAdInstance instances

isRequiredToShow

boolean isRequiredToShow()
Whether the ad is required to be shown by law, usually the ad is a companion ad.

Returns:
true if this ad is required to be shown, otherwise false
